instruction: Stop Gabapentin 300 mg capsule after three nights of 200 mg at bedtime due to potential side effects and monitoring of symptoms.

attributes.rationale: due to potential side effects and monitoring of symptoms

instruction: Order a CBC to be drawn before next week’s visit due to the combination of turmeric and aspirin. No fasting required.

attributes.comment: Order CBC due to turmeric and aspirin combination before next visit.

instruction: Write down bedtime, wake-up, and any groggy spells in a spiral notebook.

attributes.comment: Write down bedtime, wake-up, and any groggy spells in a spiral notebook.

coding.display: Advice to document signs and symptoms
